* Dinobot looked from side to side when a slight wind occasionally stirred 
up the grit and dirt, there was no such thing as being too careful when they 
were out in the open like this.
He snarled and scanned the area ahead, there was still no sign of enemy 
signatures. It was beginning to get boring!
Dinobot sighed as he continued to walk, no warrior should be idle for too 
long!
He watched the surroundings but took note that Tavatron was keeping perfect 
pace with him, but that wasn't surprising.
It was then that Dinobot thought about the Maximals that he once knew, 
Optimus, Rhinox, Rattrap, Cheetor, and SilverBolt...what happened and where 
were they?(he doesn't know that some of them are still around.)
Dinobot looked at Tavatron then back in the direction that they were 
heading, did she know?
There was no harm in trying to find out.*

" Do you know what happened to my comrades?"

* Besides, they had to pass the time some how.*
